Package com.exasol.jdbc

Class EXAConnection

java.lang.Object
com.exasol.jdbc.ServerCommunication
com.exasol.jdbc.AbstractEXAConnection
com.exasol.jdbc.EXAConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.exasol.jdbc.Protocol, AutoCloseable, Connection, Wrapper
public class EXAConnection extends AbstractEXAConnection
Extends the abstract class AbstractEXAConnection providing JAVA version specific functionality.
